packageExplanation: Below are all the services included in this medical package:

faq.question: Is food included in the package?
faq.answer: Yes, full board is included — breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

faq.question: Can I change the stay dates?
faq.answer: Yes, dates can be arranged individually when booking.

faq.question: Which languages are supported during treatment?
faq.answer: Ukrainian, English, Polish — with an on-site translator.

faq.question: Is a visa required?
faq.answer: No visa required for EU, US, or Canadian citizens for up to 90 days.
